title: THURSDAY - Ravens/Steelers recap 2020
itunes:title: THURSDAY - Ravens/Steelers recap 2020
description:
It was a very rare Wednesday game between the Ravens and Steelers (0:07) as Pittsburgh comes away with the win. Steelers head coach Mike Tomlin not happy with the way the game went (1:32). Pittsburgh suffering a big loss on defense as linebacker Bud Dupree (1:59) likely lost lost for the season. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell spoke about the possibility of a "playoff bubble" much like the NBA did (2:33), and we'll get you caught up on some of the bigger injuries that could affect games this weekend

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
